page.title: 08A typical Sunday
page.content: In the morning I get dressed, go down stairs and have my breakfast. This is usually cereals such as rice crispies. At about nine o'clock my mum goes out into the garden to weed the rockery or crazy paving. I ask a friend if he can play.We often go down to the church and then we go to the stream.At the brook we like building a camp out of mud, planks,grass and reeds.At about one o'clock I go back home for lunch. My favourite lunch is chicken with roast potatoes and peas. After lunch I help dad to put up a new fence to keep in Bracken my dog. After my tea which is normally salad or sandwiches I watch television until nine o'clock.Then I put on my pajamas, have a drink and read my book in bed.Then I go to sleep.
